purpose.description: Great job! You have created all the required pages (index, about, education, experience) and even added a contact page, fulfilling the main project requirements.
Some content is still marked as 'TBD' (e.g., in education and experience pages). To fully meet the project goals, replace 'TBD' with actual information or more descriptive placeholders.
The navigation links in the header are present, but the 'target' attribute for external links in the footer should be '_blank' (not 'blank') to open in a new tab.

readability.description: Your code is well-structured and uses Bootstrap classes consistently, making it easy to follow.

There are some typos in headings and text (e.g., 'Progaming' should be 'Programming', 'Linkedln' should be 'LinkedIn', 'Universty' should be 'University'). Correcting these will improve professionalism and clarity.
Consider adding comments in your HTML and CSS files to describe the purpose of each section, which will help with future maintenance.

performance.description: You are using Bootstrap grid classes effectively for responsive design, which is great for performance and layout.
Some images lack 'alt' text, which is important for accessibility and SEO. Add descriptive 'alt' attributes to all images.
The 'Home' button on the contact page links to 'https://example.com'. It should link to your actual home page (index.html) for proper navigation.
